Text:
Hola a que tal quisiera saber cual es el serial para ejecutar el programa


Hi just wanted to know what the serial to run the program
the link for 'generate serial' leads to a dead website. In other words, it is totally useless. please pose the serial. .

ok, so i found 'the' solution.

here's what I did.

first, I extracted the .iso file ( I used WINRAR)

you would then get a lot of files like audio,buttons,etc.

go to IMAGES folder and then games.android. 

you can now se the .apk files. copy them to your android device and install like there is no tomorrow. .
